inclusion.criterion: Indication for intravenous medicine or fluids
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Blood products, isotonic saline- or glucose-solutions (including glucose-insulin-potassium-solutions)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Chemotherapy registered for use in a peripheral vein catheter
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Expected indication for intravenous access in 5 to 28 days
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Infection or burns at both upper extremities (Involving the area of puncture site)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy (Confirmed by positive urine human gonadotropin (hCG) or plasma-hCG)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: A central venous catheter already in place
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of viral encephalitis/meningitis with residual deficits, but no indication of current infection or burns. Pregnancy status is unknown.
